Package server.handlers.move

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcceptTrade_Handler
    Handles calls from a client to accept a trade offer
    BuildCity_Handler
    Handles calls from a client to build a city
    BuildRoad_Handler
    Handles calls from a client to build a road
    BuildSettlement_Handler
    Handles calls from a client to build a settlement
    BuyDevCard_Handler
    Handles calls from a client to buy a development card
    DiscardCards_Handler
    Handles calls from a client to discard cards
    FinishTurn_Handler
    Handles calls from a client to finish a players turn
    MaritimeTrade_Handler
    Handles calls from a client to perform maritime trade
    OfferTrade_Handler
    Handles calls from a client to offer a trade
    RobPlayer_Handler
    Handles calls from a client to rob a player
    RollNumber_Handler
    Handles calls from a client to roll the dice
    SendChat_Handler
    Handles calls from a client to send a chat message
